Posts.Content: Hi Careermindedoptimist ! I have very similar results to you but my margin at the fascia of my chest wall was not clear . I totally expected to have chemo but I was then offered the Onco test which agonisingly came back as 24 ! I had decided that although I really didn’t want chemo I would do whatever the Oncologist told me to do ! However when I met with her she was of the opinion , totally unprompted by me , that I did not require chemo as my tumour was small and lymph nodes clear . The benefit to me was small for chemo 3-6% , she also recommended 15 rads plus 4 boosters and Letrozole  for 5 years . I was ecstatic !! I also did loads of reading on this site and others and found really interesting research called Tailor X . Your brain will be overloaded with info at the moment but knowledge is power . Best wishes xx
Posts.Title: ER positive clear nodes grade 3 and waiting on oncotype results.....

Posts.Title: ER positive clear nodes grade 3 and waiting on oncotype results.....

Posts.Content: Hi Caz90 , totally agree with you . I really didn’t want chemo but if my Oncologist had said to have it i would have . She also said that the rest of my treatment , the rads and Letrozole was to prevent recurrence . I guess that is the million dollar question xx
Posts.Title: ER positive clear nodes grade 3 and waiting on oncotype results.....

Posts.Content: Best wishes with your appointment, I am sure you will come to the right decision for you and your Oncologist will be so helpful . That’s the one good thing about the ‘waiting ‘ it certainly gives us plenty of time to think ! Xx
